scripts.watchify-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development watchify -vd -t envify -p browserify-hmr -e clientApp.js -o public/js/app.js
scripts.watchify-staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=development watchify -vd -t envify -p browserify-hmr -e clientApp.js -o public/js/app.js
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production browserify -g envify clientApp.js | uglifyjs -c warnings=false -m > public/js/app.min.js
scripts.build-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development browserify -g envify clientApp.js | uglifyjs -c warnings=false -m > public/js/app.js
scripts.build-staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging browserify -g envify clientApp.js | uglifyjs -c warnings=false -m > public/js/app.js
scripts.db: cross-env NODE_ENV=production knex migrate:rollback && cross-env NODE_ENV=production knex migrate:latest && cross-env NODE_ENV=production knex seed:run
scripts.db-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development knex migrate:rollback && cross-env NODE_ENV=development knex migrate:latest && cross-env NODE_ENV=development knex seed:run
scripts.db-staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging knex migrate:rollback && cross-env NODE_ENV=staging knex migrate:latest && cross-env NODE_ENV=staging knex seed:run
scripts.demo: npm install && npm run build-dev && cp-cli knexfile.js.example knexfile.js && npm run db-dev && npm run nodemon-dev
